text: TEMPLE COLLEGE VOCATIONAL NURSING PROGRAM VNSG 2510: Nursing in Health and Illness III Module 1 Endocrine Exam Blueprint 2025 Willams & Hopper Chapters Topic # of Questions 38 & 39 Endocrine - Pituitary 5 Endocrine - Thyroid 9 Endocrine - Parathyroid 3 Endocrine – Adrenal 7 38 & 40 Diabetes Pathophysiology and Diagnostic Labs 6 Diabetic Treatment: Diet, Exercise and Drugs – Insulins, Oral, and other injectable drugs (see Diabetic Drug Handout) 7 Diabetes Complications: Prevention and Treatment of Acute and Long-term Complications 11 Dosage Calculations 2 TOTAL 50
